usermanage.Acmdesc: The Super Admin and Service Admins have provision to View, Create, Edit, Password Reset, Disable, view blocked users and unblock marking personnel.
usermanage.blockdesc: The Super Admin and Service Admins have provision to view list of Blocked marking personnel and they have provision to unblock the blocked marking personnel.
usermanage.createdesc: The Super Admin and Service Admins have provision to create the global level marking personnel into the system by providing the details of 'Full Name', 'Email ID', 'Role', 'NRIC Number' and 'Phone Number'.
usermanage.passphrasedesc: In the password generation process for a newly created user or a password reset, a pass phrase plays a crucial role. It is a string comprising 8 characters and is combined with the last 4 characters of the user's NRIC to form the newly assigned password.
usermanage.name: Name
usermanage.ResetSuccessfulErrorSendEmail: The password was reset successfully, but there was an error in sending the email.
usermanage.ResetError: An error occured while resetting the password.
usermanage.samplecsv: Download the sample CSV file here
usermanage.confmessage: Are you sure you want to Unblock the users?
usermanage.uipagedesc: The Super Admin and Service Admins have provision of importing global level marking personnel into the system by uploading the data in a predefined format using a template.
usermanage.enableActiveSuccess: The user is Enabled and active succesfully
usermanage.USERMapped: User is Mapped to the project
usermanage.nricalpha: NRIC should be only alpha numeric
usermanage.phonedigit: Phone number should be min 10 and max 13 digit
usermanage.phoneformat: Phone number should be only numbers
usermanage.downloadsample: 1) Download the sample CSV File here
usermanage.nodataexcel: There is no data in excel sheet
usermanage.samplecsvfile: Invalid file, Please refer sample csv template
usermanage.invalidsamplecsvfile: Invalid data format, Please refer sample csv template
usermanage.emptyfileupload: Empty file uploaded, Please refer sample csv template
usermanage.refersamplefile: No record, Please refer sample csv template
usermanage.SCRIPTEXISTINACTIVE: Since Some script's are Checked out by this user, you cannot in-active.
usermanage.SCRIPTEXISTDISABLE: Since Some script's are Checked out by this user, you cannot Disable.
usermanage.Duplicaterecord: Duplicate record not allowed to insert
